property.name: Text
property.value: θ Spend up to 3 resources: Test a base skill value of 3 against a difficulty equal to the amount of resources just spent. If you succeed, gain twice the number of spent resources. Only ί and ΰ skill icons may be committed to this test. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +1. Choose a level 2 or less card in our discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 25. Deckbulding Options: Rogue cards (ν) level 0-5, Fortune cards level 0-3, Gambit cards level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): On the Lam, Hospital Debts, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Options: When you upgrade a Fortune or Gambit card, you may instead pay the full experience cost of the higher level version and leave the lower level version in your deck (it does not count towards your deck size or the number of copies of that card in your deck).

property.name: Text
property.value: "Skids" O'Toole deck only. Advanced. Fast. Play during any θ window. Until the end of the round, non-Elite enemies cannot attack you. At the end of the round, you may disengage from each engaged enemy and move up to 2 locations away.

property.name: Text
property.value: Advanced. Revelation – Put this card into play in your threat area. θ: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit three times per round.) Forced – When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 9 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –1 for each clue you have. β: –2 (–4 instead if you have 10 or more resources). γ: –2. If you fail, lose 3 resources. δ: –3. If you fail, "Skids" O'Toole takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –2 for each clue you have. β: –4 (–8 instead if you have 10 or more resources). γ: –3. Lose 3 resources. δ: –5. If you fail, "Skids" O'Toole takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you are in the Clover Club Cardroom, spend any number of clues: You cash in your chips. Gain 5 resources for each clue just spent. Forced – If "Skids" O'Toole is defeated: (–> R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma. If "Skids" O'Toole has resigned, proceed to (–> R1). Otherwise, proceed to (–> R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigators cannot resign. Clover Club Pit Boss gains aloof. Forced – After a Criminal enemy is defeated: Place 1 doom on the agenda. Objective – At the end of the round: If an investigator has 15 or more resources, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn the set-aside Siobhan Riley enemy in La Bella Luna. Each investigator spawns 1 set-aside Clover Club Bouncer enemy engaged with them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Criminal enemy gains hunter and gets +1 health. Forced – When an investigator resigns: Place each of that investigator's resources on this act. Objective – Collect as many resources as you can and get out. When each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Siobhan Riley engages you: For every 5 resources you have, lose 1 resource. Forced – After an investigator at Siobhan Riley's location gains 1 or more resources during the investigation phase: Siobhan Riley readies, engages that investigator, and makes an attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Clover Club Bouncer is engaged with you, it gets +1 fight and +1 evade for every 5 resources you have. η Spend 3 resources: Parley. Test έ (2). If you succeed, disengage from Clover Club Bouncer and exhaust it. It does not ready during the next upkeep phase.
